doc.title: Light It Right
doc.plot: Join renowned DP Victor Milt DGA, as he takes you through a lifetime of experience in setting up lighting for a huge variety of situations. While Vic's background has been in commercial, motion picture, and television broadcasting, he's also embraced the digital era with great enthusiasm, and has been experimenting for several years with many lighting kits varying from 10K, 600 amp lighting rigs to lighting with candles. This nearly 2-hour session with a master is sure to inspire you in addition to teaching a number of unusual but highly effective location lighting techniques.
